Sns.Subject: ALARM: "cloudwatch_metric_alarm_ebs_free_space" in EU (Ireland)
Sns.Message: {"AlarmName":"cloudwatch_metric_alarm_ebs_free_space","AlarmDescription":"This metric monitors ebs percentage of free space","AWSAccountId":"<ACCOUNT_ID>","NewStateValue":"ALARM","NewStateReason":"Threshold Crossed: 2 datapoints [27.8966045379639 (30/06/20 09:16:00), 27.897825479507475 (30/06/20 09:14:00)] were greater than or equal to the threshold (10.0).","StateChangeTime":"2020-06-30T09:18:06.972+0000","Region":"EU (Ireland)","AlarmArn":"arn:aws:cloudwatch:eu-west-1:<ACCOUNT_ID>:alarm:cloudwatch_metric_alarm_ebs_free_space","OldStateValue":"INSUFFICIENT_DATA","Trigger":{"MetricName":"FreeDiskPercentage","Namespace":"Windows/Default","StatisticType":"Statistic","Statistic":"AVERAGE","Unit":null,"Dimensions":[{"value":"<instance id>","name":"InstanceId"}],"Period":120,"EvaluationPeriods":2,"ComparisonOperator":"GreaterThanOrEqualToThreshold","Threshold":10.0,"TreatMissingData":"- TreatMissingData:                    missing","EvaluateLowSampleCountPercentile":""}}
